title: Traditional Ingredients and Their Nutritional Value

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a local ingredient in the lesson plan?
What is nutrient density?
choices: The total amount of nutrients in a food
The weight of nutrients per serving
The amount of beneficial nutrients relative to energy content
The number of different nutrients in a food
questions.answer: The amount of beneficial nutrients relative to energy content

questions.question: What are antioxidants?
choices: Compounds that increase oxidation in cells
Compounds that help protect cells from damage caused by free radicals
questions.answer: Compounds that help protect cells from damage caused by free radicals

questions.question: What is sustainable harvesting?
choices: Collecting all available plants at once
Using chemical fertilizers to increase yield
Collecting plants in a way that allows for continued growth and regeneration
questions.answer: Collecting plants in a way that allows for continued growth and regeneration

questions.question: What are micronutrients?
choices: Large nutrients needed in high quantities
Essential nutrients required in small quantities
Nutrients only found in processed foods
questions.answer: Essential nutrients required in small quantities
